channel.title: Make it so you cant log off in combat! 317 Delta (please help)
channel.description: Ok so I want to fix the x log a different way.... I want it so if someone trys to log off while in combat (like pvp) they will recive a sM message that will say "you have to wait 30 seconds while out of combat" or something like that. I want it so people have to wait 30 seconds before loging of if there in combat or just got out of combat... any code? (btw i hope this fixes the xlog)

item.title: Make it so you cant log off in combat! 317 Delta (please help)

item.description:
@swich9999999 wrote:

yes but is there a code… tx for the help =p

item.title: Make it so you cant log off in combat! 317 Delta (please help)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I don’t mess with delta so can’t help a lot, but what you could do is search for the message that says " you cannot log out of combat for 10 seconds " and try changing that timer.

Read full topic
